page.title: 14Animals kept as pets
page.content: {In Brightwalton many people keep pets. The{favourite}are{cats and dogs.}Most {animals are safe in Brightwalton}as few cars go by,but it is still better to keep your dog on a lead.Many{people {keep rabbits and goats}as pets but a {few people keep them for the table. Some{children have}their own{hamsters. Others keep{fish}in tanks.There are {many horses}around.They are kept in fields and stables by families who like riding.{The nearest vet's surgery is in{West Ilsley}about{five miles away.This can be a problem for people who have no{transport.Occasionally {people tire of their young pets and {dump them outside the village.They die {unless some-one finds them in time.
